DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare short term treatment outcome measure standard care air cell stirrup brace high tide fracture boot patient lateral ankle sprain .
DOC.detailed_description: 100 patient Grade II-III lateral ankle sprain require crutch invite participate . Patients randomly assign treat either Air Cast Stirrup Brace ( n=50 ) High Tide Fracture Boot ( n=50 ) . All patient give instruction use fracture boot air cell brace time ambulatory activity follow-up use NSAIDS need . At 2 week post-sprain follow-up follow outcome measure assess : Modified Karlsson score ( disease specific survey ) Pain VAS Patient satisfaction treatment VAS SMFA ( general health measure ) Ability walk without crutch
